review: Love the stick!  They said easy set up and it was.  Have used upstairs and in the basement and works great, just change the input.
author: Kim

review: I absolutely love this fire stick !!!!! And someone like me (;) ), could even hook it up !! :)
author: Sarah Whittum "pips mom"

review: Wow!  it is awesome and easy enough to use that I actually did it all by myself.
author: gail mattson

review: It's a great little toy to play with.... Although Comcast isn't on the list of TV subscribers so you can not get every show. Overall well worth the money !!!
author: Andrew Cautilli

review: Easy to set up and easy to use
author: GF

review: The fire stick met my expectations and I am enjoying it.
author: John Canady

review: Overall, this is a great product and has replaced my Chromecast. I had some issues with the Chromecast and it became unreliable. When I saw I could grab this for $20, I knew it was at least worth it to take a shot. It has exceeded my expectations. For right now I use it for Netflix and Amazon Prime's movies, shows and music. The interface is easy to use and the remote works great. Setup was quick and easy and it hasn't had an issue in over 2 months of use. Casting from my phone as come in handy on occasion too. I might just grab another one for the other TV.
author: Tom
